author: civanch
body: Removed circular dependence SIM-RECO between SimGeneral/TrackingAnalysis and RecoTracker/DebugTools. These was similar fix for 6_2_X in accepted pull request done by Mark Grimes. This modification do the same thing but move TrackingParticleSelector.h to SimTracker/Common to reduce run time dependence of RECO from mixing module. runTheMatrix.py run is fine but dependences shoud be rechecked.
title: Sim reco dependency
